attributes.action: Keep Birmingham Airport flightpaths away from Solihull
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned are worried about plans to expand Birmingham airport to allow up to 500,000 flights a year and the potential for flights to be routed over the densely populated areas of Solihull. We would like precise assurances over which areas these extra flights will fly over and want the government to ensure that they do not go over the homes of the people of solihull.
